name: filter_vcf_with_bedfile
title: Filter a vcf file using a BED file
summary: Creates a vcf file containing a subset of the variants within a vcf that fall within the regions in a given BED file.

inputSpec.name: input_vcf
inputSpec.label: input_vcf
inputSpec.help: The vcf file to be filtered

inputSpec.name: bedfile
inputSpec.label: bedfile to filter  vcf
inputSpec.help: The bedfile you wish to use to filter the vcf file with

outputSpec.name: filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: filtered_vcf
outputSpec.help: A vcf file containing variants from vcf that fall within the regions given in the bed file.
